entities.name: riddles
entities.description: A family that was murdered by the Avada Kedavra Curse.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who is aware of the Riddles' death.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A wizard with a scar that was mentioned by Dumbledore.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The government of wizards and witches.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: A convicted Muggle-hater who was imprisoned once for attacking one of the murdered people.

entities.name: avada kedavra curse
entities.description: A powerful and deadly curse that killed the Riddles.

entities.name: veritaserum
entities.description: A potion that forces people to tell the truth.

entities.name: legilimency
entities.description: The ability to read and control people's thoughts.

relationships.description: The Ministry called upon Morfin for questioning.
Morfin admitted to killing the Riddles.
The Ministry used Veritaserum for questioning Morfin.
Morfin was subject to Legilimency during questioning.
The Ministry investigated the murder of the Riddles.
